itemLabel: Donald Somervell, Baron Somervell of Harrow

wikipedia_page.main: Donald Bradley Somervell, Baron Somervell of Harrow,  (24 August 1889 – 18 November 1960) was a British barrister, judge and Conservative Party politician. He served as Solicitor General and Attorney General from 1933 to 1945 and was briefly Home Secretary in Winston Churchill's 1945 caretaker government.
